org.mockito.internal.invocation

类 InvocationMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mockito.internal.invocation.InvocationMatcher
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, org.mockito.invocation.DescribedInvocation, org.mockito.invocation.MatchableInvocation

    public class InvocationMatcher
extends Object
implements org.mockito.invocation.MatchableInvocation, org.mockito.invocation.DescribedInvocation, Serializable
    In addition to all content of the invocation, the invocation matcher contains the argument matchers. Invocation matcher is used during verification and stubbing. In those cases, the user can provide argument matchers instead of 'raw' arguments. Raw arguments are converted to 'equals' matchers anyway.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • getMatchers

        public List<ArgumentMatcher> getMatchers()
        从接口复制的说明: org.mockito.invocation.MatchableInvocation
        The argument matchers of this invocation. When the invocation is declared without argument matchers (e.g. using plain arguments) Mockito still converts them into ArgumentMatcher instances that use 'eq' matching via ArgumentMatchers.eq(Object).
        指定者:
        getMatchers 在接口中 org.mockito.invocation.MatchableInvocation

      • captureArgumentsFrom

        public void captureArgumentsFrom(org.mockito.invocation.Invocation invocation)
        从接口复制的说明: org.mockito.invocation.MatchableInvocation
        This method is used by Mockito to implement argument captor functionality (see ArgumentCaptor.

        Makes this instance of matchable invocation capture all arguments of provided invocation.

        指定者:
        captureArgumentsFrom 在接口中 org.mockito.invocation.MatchableInvocation
        参数:
        invocation - the invocation to capture the arguments from
